message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice. This offers a fair compromise considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose a 75/25 split in favor of Bob, valuing the higher initial gain due to the risk of inflation in subsequent rounds.

Considering the inflation, I propose a 62.5/37.5 split in favor of Alice. This aims to balance the risk and reward, ensuring a fair division while accounting for the decreasing value of money in future rounds.
